games.title: Crazy Motorcycle
games.description: Crazy Motorcycle is an exciting racing game that allows players to race motorcycles in the sky, available on various devices without downloads. Featuring vibrant graphics and thrilling gameplay, it caters to both beginners and experienced racers, providing a captivating experience for all.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop: 
WASD or arrow — Move
Jump — Space

Mobile:
Buttons and joystick on the screen

games.title: Moto Obby
games.description: Join the exciting world of Moto Obby, where your motorbike skills face intense challenges. Overcome tricky hazards like swinging hammers and sharp spikes in a quest for victory. Test your reflexes across various levels in this thrilling online game, available on phones and computers.
games.howToPlayText:
Use the arrows ⬆️⬇️ or "WS" to move and ⬅️➡️ or "AD" to spin.
Sometimes you’ll need to slow down, and other times you’ll need to speed up to win. Try different tactics.
If your bike gets stuck, press ⬅️➡️ or "AD" to hop!
